subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
College Athletics
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: To a large extent, the N.C.A.A. process is a case of two wrongs making a right, counterbalancing R.P.I. flaws by making a series of mental adjustments to it.
snippet: To a large extent, the N.C.A.A. process is a case of two wrongs making a right, counterbalancing R.P.I. flaws by making a series of mental adjustments to it.
